Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-7006 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.6.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-7006 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.6.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libtiff is earlier than 4.6.0-4, affected by CVE-2024-7006
